name: Cis-app
body:
### Welcome to CIS APP > iPhone/iPad App for RVC CIS Division. see screenshots of app: http://bit.ly/rvccisapp **How to test app:** (need latest version of iOS7) 1) If interested in testing above app, please install **UDID Tool** app to your iPhone/iPad * Download and install UDID Tool: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/udid-tool/id377602501?mt=8 * Run UDID Tool app and send UDID to: konkolapps@gmail.com * Wait for email from konkolapps@gmail.com before going to step 2. 2) Install & Test App (need latest version of iOS7) **Download and install CIS App (iPhone/iPad)** * Install via Link: [Download and Install Link (Last Updated 10/3/2013 8:05am)](https://ota.io/ideazt) * Install via Scan (Need [SCAN APP](http://bit.ly/scanappios) to scan QR Code) * ![CISAPP](http://chart.apis.google.com/chart?chs=200x200&cht=qr&chld=|1&chl=http%3A%2F%2Fqr.w69b.com%2Fg%2FqwO5MOYEg) 3) Post Feedback/Issues ### Feedback Requested: * Things you like * Things you donâ€™t like, or things that are confusing or frustrating * Ideas for improvements you have * Bugs you may have found (with instructions for how to reproduce if possible) * Go to this site to post feedback: https://mycisapp.uservoice.com/
Page Views:
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
